decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The flat roof area(s) of the development to which this permission relates shall not be used as a roof garden, balcony, seating area or other similar amenity area, and shall not be accessed except for the purpose of maintenance or in the case of emergency.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

A minimum of 3 swift bricks must be incorporated within the external walls of the development hereby approved prior to occupation and must be retained thereafter.Reason: To enhance the biodiversity of the site in accordance with the Kingston Swift (Flagship) Species Action Plan (2023), Policy DM6 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012) and Policy G6 of the London Plan (2021).

Prior to the commencement of any development above ground level, details of the facing materials (colour, materiality, manufacturer details) to be utilised in the development to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the Fire Safety Strategy Statement and DEW/2025/03/128S/07 Notes 02 hereby approved and thereafter maintained.Reason: In the interests of Fire Safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) (or any Order revoking and reenacting that Order with or without modification), no additions or enlargements to the  roof the building (other than those expressly authorised by this permission) shall be erected unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Demolition of an existing rear utility, erection of single storey side and two storey rear extension, first floor front extension. Alteration to roof with increase in height, internal alterations.
